author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Creates an object (MuonGeometryConstants) from DDCompactView of DD4Hep cms::DDCompactView and attaches to EventSetup. This can then be used in all applications (Simulation/Alignment/ ..) without invoking DDDCompactView

#### PR validation:

Tested with built in cfg files (the implementation is complete for DDD)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-gem36 Adding an object MuonGeometryConstants to EventSetup which can give similar functionality as MuonDDDConstants
